overview: "The title (how important is a good title) is perfect because, in effect, the video is that: a promise of something that is announced and does not materialize (because the image is always "coming undone") but that has the happiness and fulfillment of imminence. And I think, now, then, in that definition of Adorno about art: "a promise of happiness". This video is a promise of happiness that is all the happier to the extent that it continually remains ahead, in the future." - David Oubi√±a.
title: PROMISE
